item.description:
On November 22nd let's take a historic field trip to The John F. Kennedy Library. This November 22nd will mark the 46th Anniversary of the Assassination of John F. Kennedy (1963 in Dallas, Texas).

Let's plan on getting there around 2PM so we can catch the two introductory films. The film on RFK won several awards for best documentary. RFK was also assassinated (June 5th 1968 in Los Angeles) and died right after winning the California presidential primary.

Afterward let's plan of grabbing something to eat at Lucky's Lounge in Southie.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Trip to The JFK Library on the 46th Anniversary of JFK's Assassination in Texas
